extendedInfo.description: This is a simple app to display the time the CPU spends in each frequency state. This can be a useful tool in diagnosing battery problems or tweaking your over-clock settings.It also displays the current kernel information.Source: https://github.com/bvalosek/cpuspyXDA Developers thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1011497

reviews.title: Great! Minimalistic and useful!
reviews.comment: All that is needed is a beautiful looking icon for this amazing application
reviews.author: Rithul R

reviews.title: Good, but needs to be smarter
reviews.comment: Is Good, but really needs multiple timers, including ones which reset after each charge cycle.  Also a history and graphing function would be nice.   Not working with latest  CM10 builds for defy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great apps
reviews.comment: Great way to determine if your phone doesn\'t go to deep sleep. It always help me figure out the deep sleep issues and to test which kernel is better! Thanks dev. Is their any donate version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Would be far more useful to me if it reset timers on unplug as my phone doesn\'t sleep while plugged in. I believe most phones work this way so I\'m not sure why there isn\'t an option for it. Other than that, works perfectly. Guess ill keep manually resetting when I\'m done charging.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty basic.
reviews.comment: Good information, but could you add the amount of time each core was on for multi core phones and should the current usage? It\'s helpful if you hotplug.
reviews.author: Joseph Lewis

reviews.title: Very useful if you want to monitor your phone
reviews.comment: You could check your rom\'s battery profile and performance by how how it stays at deep sleep and peak performance
reviews.author: Cheuk Wa Wong

reviews.title: No Go
reviews.comment: This did not work on my T-Mobile HTC Sensation. I am running ICS. Sorry for the 1 star, but not good if it does not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Hekps to check if somethings preventing your cpu from taking deep sleep naps in idle
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I don\'t know why a five stars,but I feel the different in my xperia mini,more faster.thx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really good application, but it would be nice if can detect application make cpu high
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just perfect!
reviews.comment: Very useful if you want to check if the device idle properly. Very simple and require no additional permissions, love it. Galaxy Nexus & Nexus S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: My samsung transform runs 800MHz full speed all day... minus the sleep time...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So helpful
reviews.comment: While this app doesn\'t show much info. The info it does show is priceless. Dunno jo I live without it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent..
reviews.comment: Works great. I can now monitor my battery usage. 3rd day of my lenovo p700i and it still got 25% left. I should give it 6 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app - Always installed on my phone to check deep sleep after installing new apps. Thanks dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but not great
reviews.comment: Would be far more helpful if it reset the timer automatically after unplugging and reported the level the battery was charged to. Please consider adding these options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Useful
reviews.comment: It\'s a wonder Android doesn\'t give you this information itself.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have app
reviews.comment: Now, this is my battery saver. it keeps record of my CPU speeds and lets me choose the best custom kernel.  Extended my battery life almost to double.
reviews.author: Akhil Gopi

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: If you have battery problems, this app can help you diagnose it. If your phone is off for a few hours it should go into deep sleep for those hours you don\'t use it. If it does not, you have a problem.  This app will allow you to see that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Nice little utility. Does what it says and uses the new Holo theme on ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User
